data_table.description: Home Interview, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HOMCY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM05
variable.description: Do you have definite plans to move out of the area in the near future? Q5 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM09
variable.description: Compared to other people your age, would you say that your health is excellent, good, fair or poor? Q9 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: high blood pressure or hypertension? Q10a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: high blood cholesterol? Q10b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: heart attack? Q10c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10D
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: stroke? Q10d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10E
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: diabetes (sugar in the blood)? Q10e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10F
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: cancer? Q10f [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10G
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: chronic lung disease, such as chronic bronchitis, or emphysema? Q10g [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM10H
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: asthma? Q10h [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM11
variable.description: Have you stayed overnight as a patient in a hospital during the past year? Q11 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM12
variable.description: Is your natural mother living? Q12 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM13
variable.description: Age of natural mother at death. Q13 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM14
variable.description: Cause of natural mother's death. Q14 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM15A
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have any of the following diseases? Cancer? Q15a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM15B
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have any of the following diseases? Diabetes (sugar in the blood)? Q15b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM15C
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have any of the following diseases? High blood pressure or hypertension (high blood)? Q15c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM15D
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have any of the following diseases? Stroke? Q15d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM15E
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have any of the following diseases? Heart attack? Q15e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM16A
variable.description: How old was she when she was first told she had: cancer. Q16a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM16B
variable.description: How old was she when she was first told she had: diabetes. Q16b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM16C
variable.description: How old was she when she was first told she had: high blood pressure. Q16c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM16D
variable.description: How old was she when she was first told she had: stroke. Q16d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM16E
variable.description: How old was she when she was first told she had: heart attack. Q16e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM17
variable.description: Age of natural mother. Q17 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM18A
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have or does she now have any of the following diseases? Cancer? Q18a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM18B
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have or does she now have any of the following diseases? Diabetes (sugar in the blood)? Q18b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have or does she now have any of the following diseases? High blood pressure or hypertension (high blood)? Q18c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have or does she now have any of the following diseases? Stroke? Q18d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM18E
variable.description: Did your natural mother ever have or does she now have any of the following diseases? Heart attack? Q18e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM19A
variable.description: How old was she when she was first she had: cancer Q19a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM19B
variable.description: How old was she when she was first she had: diabetes Q19b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM19C
variable.description: How old was she when she was first she had: high blood pressure. Q19c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM19D
variable.description: How old was she when she was first she had: stroke. Q19d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM19E
variable.description: How old was she when she was first she had: heart attack. Q19e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Natural father living? Q20 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Age of natural father at death. Q21 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM22
variable.description: Cause of natural father's death. Q22 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM23A
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have any of the following diseases? Cancer? Q23a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Did your natural father ever have any of the following diseases? Diabetes? Q23b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: Did your natural father ever have any of the following diseases? Stroke? Q23d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM23E
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have any of the following diseases? Heart attack? Q23e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM24A
variable.description: How old was he when he was first told he had: cancer. Q24a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM24B
variable.description: How old was he when he was first told he had: diabetes. Q24b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM24C
variable.description: How old was he when he was first told he had: high blood pressure. Q24c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.description: How old was he when he was first told he had: stroke. Q24d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM24E
variable.description: How old was he when he was first told he had: heart attack. Q24e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM25
variable.description: Age of natural father. Q25 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM26A
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have or does he now have any of the following diseases: Cancer? Q26a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM26B
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have or does he now have any of the following diseases: Diabetes? Q26b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM26C
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have or does he now have any of the following diseases: High BP? Q26c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM26D
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have or does he now have any of the following diseases: Stroke? Q26d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM26E
variable.description: Did your natural father ever have or does he now have any of the following diseases: Heart attack? Q26e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM27A
variable.description: How old was he when he [natural father] was first told he had: cancer. Q27a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM27B
variable.description: How old was he when he [natural father] was first told he had: diabetes. Q27b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM27C
variable.description: How old was he [natural father] when he was first told he had: high blood pressure. Q27c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM27D
variable.description: How old was he [natural father] when he was first told he had: stroke. Q27d [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM27E
variable.description: How old was he when he [natural father] was first told he had: heart attack. Q27e [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM28
variable.description: Have you ever smoked cigarettes? Q28 [Home Interview, exam 1]
variable.comment: CODE "NO" LESS THAN 400 CIGARETTES IN A LIFETIME.

variable.name: HOM29
variable.description: How old were you when you first started regular cigarette smoking? Q29 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM30
variable.description: Do you now smoke cigarettes? Q30 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM31
variable.description: Age stopped smoking cigarettes Q31 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM32
variable.description: Number of cigarettes smoked per day. Q32 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM33
variable.description: During the years that you have not smoked, was there ever a period of one year or more that you did not smoke cigarettes? Q33 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM34
variable.description: How many years did you not smoke cigarettes? Q34 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM35
variable.description: On the average of the entire time you smoked, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day? Q35 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM36
variable.description: (Do/did) you inhale the cigarette smoke? Q36 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM37
variable.description: Have you ever smoked a pipe regularly? Q37 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM38
variable.description: How old were you when you started to smoke a pipe regularly? Q38 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM39
variable.description: Do you now smoke a pipe? Q39 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM40
variable.description: How old were you when you stopped? Q40 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM41
variable.description: How much pipe tobacco are you smoking now? (oz. per week). Q41 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM42
variable.description: On the average over the entire time you smoked a pipe, how much pipe tobacco did you smoke per week? (oz. per week). Q42 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM43
variable.description: (Do/did) you ever inhale the pipe smoke? Q43 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM44
variable.description: Ever smoked cigars or cigarillos regularly? Q44 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM45
variable.description: How old were you when you started smoking (cigars/cigarillos) regularly? Q45 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM46
variable.description: Do you now smoke (cigars/cigarillos)? Q46 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM47
variable.description: How old were you when you stopped smoking? Q47 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM48
variable.description: How many (cigars/cigarillos) do you smoke per week now? Q48 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM49
variable.description: On the average, over the entire time you smoked (cigars/cigarillos), how many (cigars/cigarillos) did you smoke per week? Q49 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM50
variable.description: (Do/did) you inhale the (cigar/cigarillo) smoke? Q50 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM51A
variable.description: Currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor: chewing tobacco? Q51a [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM51B
variable.description: Currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor: snuff? Q51b [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM51C
variable.description: Currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor: nicotine gum? Q51c [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM52
variable.description: ASK NON-SMOKERS ONLY: during the past year, about how many hours per week, on the average, were you in close contact with people when they were smoking? Q52 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM53
variable.description: Number of years a resident [name of community].Q53 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM54
variable.description: Highest grade or year of school completed. Q54 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM55
variable.description: Current occupation. Q55 [Home Interview, exam 1]
variable.value: Homemaking, not working outside the home
Employed at a job for pay, either full or part-time
Employed, but temporarily away from my regular job
Retired from my usual occupation and not working
Retired from my usual occupation but working for pay

variable.name: HOM56
variable.description: Health reasons cause retirement? Q56 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM57
variable.description: What (is/was) your (current/most recent) occupation? If more than one job, RECORD OCCUPATION FOR JOB FOR MOST HOURS PER WEEK. Code of most recent occupation. Q57 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM58
variable.description: Self employed for Q57 occupation? Q58 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM60
variable.description: Type of business Q60 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM62
variable.description: Total combined family income for the past 12 months. Q62 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM63
variable.description: FOR MD OR MS ONLY: do you have a driver's license with an address in _. Q63 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM64
variable.description: FOR MN Only: do you have a driver's license with an address in _. Q64 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOM56B
variable.description: Never worked. Q56 [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: HOMFLAG
variable.description: Flag indicating presence of HOM [Home Interview, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Home Interview, exam 1]
